text: Barbara Hammond (26 July 1943 - 9 November 2009) was a British equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2009 deaths Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Aughton, Lancashire
title: Barbara Hammond (equestrian)
